channel.title: Making Server Public
channel.description:
How the hell do i make my server public lol? Im using dragon-history source. I got no-ip clicked the box runserver and compile works i can login in though piscape.no-ip.org no one else can. Wtf my ipconfig works my path works my classpath works my javac works help! It would be nice to help me through team viewer 4! I dont have a router! Help and i will reward!
~Thanks geeno~
Rewards! 1. Awsome video for whatevr made by me. (will be posted on youtube) 2. I can code a server. 3. Make an awsome website for anything. (ex. http://porkpistols.smfforfree.com/) 4. All of these if you do this and help me get talking NPC's (devolution 7 source)

item.title: Making Server Public
item.dc:creator: @pk3r_john pk3r john
item.description:
@pk3r_john wrote:

You don’t need to use Utorrent, just go to your exceptions and add your server there and make sure the port is 43594 or your custom port.

Read full topic

item.title: Making Server Public

item.description:
@koopa_king wrote:

Well, you need to portforward. Since you said you didn’t have a router, try using µTorrent. =]
